title: The Mighty Female Immortal - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Martial Arts   Romance   Shoujo   Xianxia
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Beautiful Female Lead   Cultivation   Female Protagonist   Pill Concocting   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Unique Cultivation Technique   Weak to Strong
author: 金铃动
description: Coming from the modern era, she was sent to a strange world. The body she possessed previously belonged to a young woman whose family was thrown away by their clan. However with the “Dan Fu Zong”, the inheritance from her old world, she steps on the path of cultivation, hoping to one day become an immortal.>
